welcome_message_body: "Welcome to Golfito, Costa Rica! Get ready to experience the charm and beauty of our city, known for its stunning beaches, lush nature, and vibrant culture. Enjoy your stay and explore all that Golfito has to offer!"

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Golfito Airport serves domestic and international flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Puerto Jimenez Airport serves both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Cargo Terminal
terminals.description: The cargo terminal at Puerto Jimenez Airport handles all freight and cargo operations.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.
